alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bibb, central Twiggs, southeastern Monroe, north central Crawford and southwestern Jones Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Sandy Point to near Wesleyan to near Franklinton to Marion, and moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Jeffersonville, Payne, Payne City, Marion, Postell, Lake Tobesofkee, Bolingbroke, Griswoldville, Fitzpatrick, Ripley, Huber, Cross Keys, District Path, Wesleyan, Dry Branch, Lizella, Myricks Mill, Arkwright and Franklinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
